casebody.data:
The PEOPLE etc., Appellant,
v.
Brian HAKES, Respondent. Motion No. 2018-351 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided April 26, 2018

Motion by New York State Defenders Association for leave to file a brief amicus curiae on the appeal herein granted and the proposed brief is accepted as filed. Two copies of the brief must be served, an original and nine copies filed, and the brief submitted in digital format within seven days.
